conclusion: Consider forces on each wire segment separately and combine them.
Wire AB is in a magnetic field pointing inward; wire BC is in a magnetic field pointing outward; current I flows through both segments.
Calculate force on segment AB: F_AB = BIL.
Calculate force on segment BC: F_BC = BIL.
Force on AB is out of the plane; force on BC is into the plane (right-hand rule).
Resolve forces into components; components along wire cancel out; perpendicular components add up.
